author: maxgalli
body:
The decrease of precision for shower shape variables, introduced in [this PR](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36526), seems to introduce unwanted features in the shapes.
A comparison of Run2 samples with precision 8 and 10 can be found at the following links:
- precision 10, no unwanted features ([S4 plot](https://gallim.web.cern.ch/gallim/plots/Hgg/NormFlowsCorrections/From231027/preprocess/Run2UL17/probe_s4_eb_pipe1_test_transformed_back_data.pdf))
- precision 8, unwanted features in the tail ([S4 plot](https://gallim.web.cern.ch/gallim/plots/Hgg/NormFlowsCorrections/From231027/preprocess/Run2UL17_lowprecision/probe_s4_eb_pipe1_test_transformed_back_data.pdf))
- precision 10, no unwanted features ([R9 plot](https://gallim.web.cern.ch/gallim/plots/Hgg/NormFlowsCorrections/From231027/preprocess/Run2UL17/probe_r9_eb_pipe1_test_transformed_back_data.pdf))
- precision 8, unwanted features in the tail ([R9 plot](https://gallim.web.cern.ch/gallim/plots/Hgg/NormFlowsCorrections/From231027/preprocess/Run2UL17_lowprecision/probe_r9_eb_pipe1_test_transformed_back_data.pdf))
title: Revert decrease of precision introduced in ea3f693d
